translated: Friedrich Schiller was a German poet and writer, born November 10, 1759 in Marbach-am-Neckar (near Stuttgart), who died in Weimar 9 May 1805.
original: Friedrich von Schiller est un poète et écrivain allemand, né le 10 novembre 1759 à Marbach-am-Neckar (près de Stuttgart), mort à Weimar le 9 mai 1805.
